channel.title: Portals
channel.description:
Ok i made my own server then my friend asked to combine his server with mine...so we did his is in catherby and mines in entrana, we made 1 starting place in edgeville bank, i was wondering how do i put a portal in edgeville bank to make 1 go to entrana and the other to catherby, please tell me everything
thanks old_nite

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @old_nite old_nite
item.description:
@old_nite wrote:

thanks but i still dont understand =( i need a huge tut i dont understand absolutely anything about the portals

EDIT: Fedexrs tut was done on this source i downloaded and also if theres any tut on it please post link or if someone can make 1

Read full topic

and there will be some objects

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

Add the portals in your globalobjects , and name a case , for example , the portals ID is 0000 then make case 0000:
teleport = absX;
teleport = absY;
break;
replace absX and absY by the coords

Read full topic
